parameters.query: =query Tournaments($gameId: [ID]!, $startDate: Timestamp!, $endDate: Timestamp!, $eventType: [Int]!) { tournaments(query: { perPage: 500, filter: { videogameIds: $gameId, afterDate: $startDate, beforeDate: $endDate } }) { nodes { name addrState countryCode events(filter: { videogameId: $gameId, type: $eventType })  { id tournament { name } name slug numEntrants } } } }
=query Event($eventId: ID!) { event(id: $eventId) { id phases { id } phaseGroups { id phase { phaseOrder id name } } tournament { name } } }

=query PhaseInfo($phaseId: ID!) { phase(id: $phaseId) { id name phaseOrder phaseGroups { nodes { id bracketType } } sets { nodes { id displayScore identifier round games { orderNum } winnerId } } event { id tournament { name } } } }

parameters.content: Need to adjust these. Not finding multiday events and only looking at last game for winning character. Grand finals reset does something weird too.
